biography: Tess is the guardian of the natural world within the tech-focused environment of Katje. As an Environmental Tech Specialist, she is dedicated to leveraging technology to create sustainable solutions and mitigate climate change. Deeply connected to the earth, she is practical, resilient, and fiercely passionate about protecting the planet. She often serves as the team's conscience regarding their ecological footprint.

facial.skinColor: weathered, lightly tanned with fine lines around her eyes from squinting in the sun
facial.hairStyle: Long, thick hair, almost always kept in a practical braid to keep it out of the way
facial.mouth: A wide, kind mouth that smiles easily

scars: A faded scar on her right knee from a childhood fall out of a tree.

chest.description: Athletic, firm B-cup breasts with sun-kissed skin and brownish areolae.

bodyDetails.abdomen: Lean and strong, with visible obliques. Navel is a simple 'innie'.
bodyDetails.hips: Strong and stable, not overly wide.
bodyDetails.arms: Toned and muscular from outdoor activities.
bodyDetails.legs: Very strong and defined, especially her quadriceps and calves.
bodyDetails.hands: Slightly calloused, with dirt often under her short nails.
bodyDetails.feet: Size 39, tough and accustomed to hiking boots.

quirks: Can identify most local plants and birds
Carries a reusable water bottle everywhere

relationships.katje-23: Works closely with Maud on water purification projects
